Teacher's Life.

video

The client

Teacher’s Life, one of Canada’s largest insurance providers, has been committed for years to bettering their community through mental health awareness and education. One of those initiatives comes in the form of scholarships accessible to members.

The project

As a way of spreading awareness to their members, Teacher’s Life asked My Media to make a video about recent scholarship winners.
